#summary Summary of controller hardware.

= Parts =
For a complete list of components see [RSeriesControllerShieldPartsList]
  * Arduino Mega 2560 - from [http://www.dfrobot.com/index.php?route=product/product&product_id=458 DFRobot], [http://www.sparkfun.com/products/11061 SparkFun], [http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004A7H3DG/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=murphy00-20&linkCode=as2&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeASIN=B004A7H3DG Amazon], [http://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_nkw=arduino+mega+2560+-shield+-kit+-uno eBay] etc.
  * Controller Shield PCB - from [http://pcb.laen.org Laen]
  * Adafruit 2.8" Touchscreen - from [http://www.adafruit.com/products/335 Adafruit.com]
  * Wii Nunchuk (Nintendo brand recommended) - from [http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000IMYKQ0/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=murphy00-20&linkCode=as2&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeASIN=B000IMYKQ0 Amazon] etc.
  * XBee Pro Series 2 Module with RPSMA antenna connector (XBP24BZ7SIT-004) - from [http://www.digi.com/products/model?mid=2603 Digi], [http://www.mouser.com/ProductDetail/Digi-International/XBP24BZ7SIT-004/?qs=sGAEpiMZZMu3sxpa5v1qrlZXrkmQG2M06vkdoL2YBys%3D Mouser], [http://parts.digikey.com/1/parts/1948593-module-zigbee-pro-w-rpsma-ant-xbp24bz7sit-004.html Digi-Key] etc.
  * RPSMA Antenna - from [http://www.digi.com/products/model?mid=2603 Digi], [http://parts.digikey.com/1/parts/635412-ant-2-4ghz-dipole-half-wave-a24-hasm-450.html Digi-Key], etc.
  * Screw Terminal (for connecting nunchuk) - from [http://parts.digikey.com/1/parts/374526-term-block-4pos-side-ent-2-54mm-282834-4.html Digi-Key]
  * XBee Sockets (2) - from [http://search.digikey.com/scripts/DkSearch/dksus.dll?Detail?name=S5751-10-ND Digi-Key], [http://www.mouser.com/Search/ProductDetail.aspx?qs=WS5Jv%252b%252bx1qUfXs5lYp1U1g%3d%3d Mouser] or [http://www.sparkfun.com/products/8272 SparkFun]
  * Voltage Regulator (MCP1700-3302E/TO) - from [http://search.digikey.com/scripts/dksearch/dksus.dll?vendor=0&keywords=MCP1700-3302E%2FTO-ND Digi-Key] or [http://www.mouser.com/Search/ProductDetail.aspx?qs=h7tZ5KkzNMMPEB66r2rMQw%3d%3d Mouser]
  * Buffer chip (74AHC125N) - from [http://search.digikey.com/us/en/products/SN74AHC125N/296-4531-5-ND/375724 Digi-Key] or [http://www.mouser.com/ProductDetail/Texas-Instruments/SN74AHC125N/?qs=DXdcjUGny5MST0EFXjN0s5T7aaGfxZzO3NLSvqGw%252b8o%3d Mouser]
  * Resistors : 1k (2), 10k (6), 47k  1% precision (1), 24k 1% precision or better(1)
  * Capacitors : (1) 0.1uF and (1) 100uF
  * Pin-Headers : (2) 40-pin single row and (2) 40-pin double row
